title: Is We Dumb? | Stress Ball. Slap Chop. Censorship. Paperclip.
description:
Have you ever wondered what's inside of a stress ball? How about accidentally consumed whatever is inside a stress ball? Joe has. Let's talk about that, the annoying paperclip from Microsoft Word, a lot of silliness about a banana slicer, peeing on someone's face during a concert, and more on today's Episode of Is We Dumb?!

 

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

 

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/Co6W_6YvUlE

 

Show Links:

USAF Tiktok | https://bit.ly/3cgHb7k

Museum OnlyFans | https://bit.ly/3FhKUho

Concert Pee | Search for "Brass Against Pee Show"

 

Suggestions for segment content: dumb@iswedumb.com
